meanings.definition: A school or college, especially a Muslim school for religious instruction.
meanings.sent1: The local madrasah provides education on Islamic teachings.
meanings.sent2: Students attend the madrasah to learn about their faith.
meanings.sent3: The madrasah students had a fun time learning about their religion.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a madrasah of knowledge, filled with wisdom and understanding.
meanings.sent5: The colorful walls of the madrasah echoed with the sounds of eager learners.

meanings.definition: A building or group of buildings used for Islamic religious instruction.
meanings.sent1: The beautiful madrasah stood tall in the center of the town.
meanings.sent2: The community donated funds to renovate the historic madrasah.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat found its way into the peaceful madrasah courtyard.
meanings.sent4: The old madrasah whispered stories of the past to those who listened.
meanings.sent5: The golden dome of the madrasah gleamed in the sunlight, a beacon of knowledge.
